feed.title: Analysis of Replacement Cycling Attacks Risks on L2s (beyond LN)

entry.title: Analysis of Replacement Cycling Attacks Risks on L2s (beyond LN)
entry.summary: The inquiry posed concerns the potential impact on coinswap as detailed in the provided documentation, specifically querying about associated risks. The referenced material is a development book found at [GitHub](https://github.com/utxo-teleport/teleport-transactions/blob/master/docs/dev-book.mdhow-coinswap-works), which discusses the workings of coinswap transactions. The question aims to understand if certain factors might affect the operation or security of coinswap and what those risks could entail.
